Name.description: The name for each car in this dataset.

Miles_per_Gallon.description: The distance a car can travel per gallon of fuel.

Cylinders.description: This generates power for a car. Generally, more cylinders produce more power.

Displacement.description: This also helps to generate power for a car. Bigger displacement helps to generate more power.

Horsepower.description: A measure for the power of an engine. The higher the horsepower, the faster the car can go.

Weight_in_lbs.description: The weight of a car in pounds.

Acceleration.description: The rate at which a car can increase its speed.

precipitation.description: Water that fall from clouds and reach the ground.

temp_max.description: Maximum temperature on a particular day in Seattle.

temp_min.description: Minimum temperature on a particular day in Seattle.

wind.description: The speed of wind in meters per second.

weather.description: Weather on a particular day in Seattle.

region.description: The code for a region in this dataset.

total_cases.description: Total number of confirmed cases in a region.

cases_per_100_people.description: Confirmed cases per 100 people in a region.

question_text: I think that I would like to use this system frequently.
I found the system unnecessarily complex.
I thought the system was easy to use.
I think that I would need the support of a technical person to be able to use this system.
I found the various functions in this system were well integrated.
I thought there was too much inconsistency in this system.
I would imagine that most people would learn to use this system very quickly.
I found the system very cumbersome to use.
I felt very confident using the system.
I needed to learn a lot of things before I could get going with this system.
